plot: Cartman is sent to juvenile hall after he throws a rock at a black child.

During a playground argument, Cartman throws a rock at Token. Because Token is black, the incident is treated as a hate crime and Cartman is sentenced to juvenile detention hall where he must rely on his special talents for survival. Meanwhile, the other boys decide they have to get Cartman released when it becomes obvious that they need his bulk in order to win a sledding contest against a team of girls.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
